# ğŸ”¥ Fire Detection System - Distribution Package

## ğŸ“¦ What's Included:

### Option 1: Executable Version (Recommended)
- `FireDetectionSystem.exe` (28.5 MB) - Standalone executable
- `QUICK_START.txt` - Quick setup guide

### Option 2: Python Script Version (Alternative)
- `START_FIRE_DETECTION.bat` - One-click startup script
- `Fire_detector/` - Complete Django project folder
- All source code and assets included

## ğŸš€ Quick Start (Choose One Method):

### Method 1: Executable (Easiest)
1. Double-click `FireDetectionSystem.exe`
2. Wait for browser to open
3. Allow camera access
4. Start monitoring!

### Method 2: Python Script (More Reliable)
1. Double-click `START_FIRE_DETECTION.bat`
2. Wait for automatic setup
3. Browser opens automatically
4. Allow camera access

## ğŸ“‹ System Requirements:
- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- 2GB RAM minimum (4GB recommended)
- Webcam or camera device
- Internet connection (optional, for SMS alerts)

## ğŸ¯ Features:
âœ… Real-time AI fire detection
âœ… Professional web dashboard
âœ… Manual emergency alerts
âœ… SMS/WhatsApp notifications (optional)
âœ… Demo mode for low-memory systems
âœ… Bilingual support (English/Hindi)

## ğŸ”§ Troubleshooting:

### If Executable Doesn't Work:
- Try Method 2 (Python Script)
- Run as Administrator
- Check antivirus settings

### If Python Script Doesn't Work:
- Install Python 3.8+ from python.org
- Run as Administrator
- Check internet connection

### Camera Issues:
- Allow camera permissions in browser
- Close other apps using camera
- Try different browser

## ğŸ“± SMS Setup (Optional):
1. Sign up at twilio.com
2. Get Account SID and Auth Token
3. Create `.env` file with credentials:
   ```
   TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=your_sid
   TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN=your_token
   TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER=+1234567890
   ```

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Safety Notice:
This system assists in fire detection but should NOT replace proper fire safety equipment and procedures.

## ğŸ“ Support:
- GitHub: https://github.com/hemantMohane29/YOLO-Based-Real-Time-Fire-Detection
- Report issues on GitHub Issues page

## ğŸ“Š Performance:
- **Executable**: 28.5 MB, runs immediately
- **Python Script**: Requires Python, more reliable
- **Memory Usage**: 2-4GB depending on AI mode
- **Detection Speed**: 1-2 FPS real-time processing
